title: Tempest Domain
content:
in Tips & Builds

Tempest Domain focuses on melee combat. Having Martial Combat and Heavy Armor training enables them to wield weapons and armor that other Cleric subclasses cannot use without requiring additional feats. This domain specializes in dealing elemental damage in close range, mostly lightning. They can also disrupt enemies from a distance when they try to close in.
